Package com.severalcircles.flames.data

Class FlamesDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.severalcircles.flames.data.FlamesDataManager
  • public class FlamesDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing Flames data, such as user and guild data.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        public static void prepare()
        Checks if data directories exists and creates them if not.

      • newUser

        public static boolean newUser​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User user)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if a given user exists. If they do, simply returns false. If not, it'll create user data for that user, then return true.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • save

        public static void save​(FlamesUser flamesUser)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Saves data for a FlamesUser to a file in the user directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If flames can't write files for whatever reason.

      • readUser

        public static FlamesUser readUser​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User user)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  ConsentException,
                                  DataVersionException
        Reads data for a user from the data directory
        Parameters:
        user - Discord User to get data for
        Returns:
        A FlamesUser created from the data file
        Throws:
        ConsentException - If the user hasn't consented yet won't return data
        java.io.IOException
        DataVersionException

      • readUser

        public static FlamesUser readUser​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User user,
                                  boolean skipConsent)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  ConsentException
        Reads data for a user from the data directory
        Parameters:
        user - Discord User to get data for
        skipConsent - If true, won't throw an exception if the user hasn't consented. For most cases, leave this false or null.
        Returns:
        A FlamesUser created from the data file
        Throws:
        ConsentException - If the user hasn't consented yet won't return data
        java.io.IOException

      • newGuild

        public static boolean newGuild​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if a guild has been seen before. Behaves otherwise the same as newUser.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • save

        public static void save​(FlamesGuild guild)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Saves a guild to its data file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    NewGuildException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        NewGuildException
